actions.name: Pact Blade
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks):
At Will: Light, Thaumaturgy
2/Day: Command
1/Day: Hold Person

bonus_actions.name: Spiritual Weapon
bonus_actions.description: The cultist casts the Spiritual Weapon spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
